language-web-incubator-area-measurement-: The AreaMeasurement3D component calculates and displays the area and perimeter of a polygon.
language-web-incubator-line-of-sight-3d-: The LineOfSight component is a 3D analysis tool that allows you to perform visibility analysis in a SceneView.
language-web-incubator-daylight-widget-3: The daylight component can be used to manipulate the time and date and to toggle shadows in a SceneView.
language-web-incubator-elevation-profile: The ElevationProfile component is used to generate and display an elevation profile from an input line graphic.
language-web-incubator-shadow-cast-3d-de: The ShadowCast component displays the cumulative shadows of 3D features in a SceneView.
language-web-incubator-slice-3d-descript: The slice component is a 3D analysis tool that can be used to reveal occluded content in a SceneView.
language-designer-3d-tools-daylight-play: When disabled, neither of the play buttons are displayed.
language-designer-3d-tools-daylight-shad: When disabled, the shadow toggle button is not displayed.
language-designer-3d-tools-daylight-date: When disabled, neither the date nor the season picker are displayed.
language-designer-3d-tools-daylight-time: When disabled, the timezone selector is not displayed.
language-designer-3d-tools-daylight-date: Controls whether the widget displays a date or a season picker.
language-designer-3d-tools-daylight-play: Controls the speed of the daytime and date animation.
language-designer-3d-tools-shadow-cast-t: When disabled, the slider used to select a time range for the analysis is not displayed.
When disabled, the dropdown used to select a timezone for the time range is not displayed.
language-designer-3d-tools-shadow-cast-d: When disabled, the date picker is not displayed.
language-designer-3d-tools-shadow-cast-v: When disabled, the options for the various visualization modes are not displayed.
language-designer-3d-tools-shadow-cast-c: When disabled, the color picker is not displayed in the options for any of the visualization modes.
language-designer-3d-tools-shadow-cast-t: When disabled, the tooltip with the accumulated shadow time is not displayed when hovering the view.
language-designer-3d-tools-shadow-cast-v: Type of visualization to use when showing the shadows.
language-designer-3d-tools-elevation-pro: When disabled, the legend (which includes statistics) is not displayed.
Show Widget Legend
When disabled, the chart is not displayed.
Show Widget Chart
When disabled the button used to clear the current elevation profile is not displayed.
Show Widget Clear Button
When disabled, the button used to open the settings popup is not displayed.
Show Widget Settings Button
When disabled, the button used to start drawing/sketching is not displayed.
Show Widget Sketch Button
When disabled, the button used to select a path is not displayed.
Show Widget Select Button
When disabled, the element used to toggle uniform chart scaling on or off is not displayed.
Show Widget Uniform Chart Scaling
Profile line which samples elevation from the Ground of the Map currently set in the View.
Use Ground Line Profile
Profile line which samples elevation from a custom elevation source, for example by creating a new ElevationLayer, or by using an elevation layer from ground.layers.
Use Line Input Profile
Profile line which samples elevation directly from the SceneView.
Use Line View Profile
Ground Line Profile Color
Color of the line on the chart and in the view.
Line Input Profile Color
Color of the line on the chart and in the view.
Line View Profile Color
Color of the line on the chart and in the view.
